Instrument: Audiometry: screen at 25 dB (HL) for frequencies 500, 1000, 2000 and 4000 Hz.
Measure: Passed if average threshold in better ear was 30 dB or less

Instrument: Woodcock Johnson III Tests of Cognitive Abilities (Woodcock, McGrew, & Mather, 2007)
NEPSY: A Developmental Neuropsychological Assessment (Korkman, Kirk, & Kemp, 1998)
Neale Analysis of Reading Ability – 2nd British edition  (NARA-II) (Neale, 1999)
Measure: Passage reading, giving measures of accuracy, comprehension and rate

Instrument: Test of Word Reading Efficiency (TOWRE) (Torgesen, Wagner, & Rashotte, 1999)
Measure: Speeded reading of words (Sight Word Efficiency) and nonwords (Phonetic Decoding Efficiency)
